DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, absorb a #yBurn from your hand, randomly deal #b10 damage to an enemy, then put that #yBurn into your discard pile.
When you already have #b6 #yFireVampires, this card triggers an additional effect when played.
When applied, lose max HP equals to #yBlackFlame. #yBlackFlamed creatures lose HP and max HP equals to #b10% of #yBlackFlame at the start of their turn.
Whenever you play a card, the enemy receives #b10% more damage from #yAttacks this turn.
Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
Each #yFlare card can be trigged once per turn. #bRight #bClick to #yExhaust any number of #yBurn in your hand and trigger effects corresponding to the number of #yExhausted #yBurns.
Enter #yDivinity and draw cards until your hand is full. This effect will also be triggered at the beginning of your turn.
When a card with #yFirelink is played or #yExhausted, gain equivalent #yBlock, then randomly distribute the #yFirelink value to unexhausted cards. #yFirelink limit is 3.
Can only be triggered if no #yAttack cards have been played this turn. After triggering this effect, you cannot play any #yAttack cards this turn.
Receives 50% less unblocked attack damage. Losing this power if dealt corresponding times of #yAttack damage in one turn, otherwise restore all at the beginning of next turn.
Channeling an #yFireVampire puts it into your first empty slot.
Additional effect triggered when playing this card with remaining Flare.
